Are you looking for the best goal planner app online? Vervo - Goal Tracker & Habit Tracker App is the answer. As a much liked goal reminder app, Vervo is making lives easier and more productive with its amazing features like to do list, daily goals tracker, life goals reminder and much more.

Experience a delightful array of features on this goal tracker & habit tracker app! Vervo is based on scientific evidence to help you plan your to do list, track goals, commit and achieve your life goals using rich motivation-based features which are also helpful in enabling social inspirations through family, friends, and the world.

An amazing goal tracker & habit tracker app for everyone! Vervo also acts as your motivation app and goal planner towards accomplishing your goals. You can also use it as your daily planner or weekly planner to track simple goals or daily routines like grocery shopping, going to the gym, drinking water, etc. By committing to some of these small goals, you can also build new healthy habits and take those strides towards your ultimate goals.

Show off your progress with this unique goal reminder app! Share amazingly captioned photos that you can with the world and let others give you likes and kudos through Vervo. We promise Vervo will help you in your workout motivation, fitness motivation, studying, saving, etc. It was designed to be easy yet feature rich to sit as your ultimate productive goals app.

  Scientifically-backed goal reminder app! We've found strong scientific research showing how greater time pressure accentuates the perceived importance of accomplishment. Vervo accentuates the time aspect of your goal tracking and planning through unique features tailored for that purpose. Psychologists believe that effective time management and therefore achieving goals is well affected by a structured routine and effective organization.

Commit and achieve new life goals with this goal Planner app everyday! We've founded Vervo on these concepts to help us and you commit and accomplish goals. So go ahead show your wonderful, fabulous self how what you can achieve and check off those items off your todo list.

How to use Vervo:

- Download and launch the app
- Use the goal planner app to track goals, bills payments and due dates
- Create and achieve new weight loss and fitness goals
- Manage family vacations and expenses
- Organize gatherings and events
- Create your budget to save up for your car
- Add and finish school projects
- Improve your credit score
- Save up to your new house
- Track your development tasks, etc.

These are just a few usage examples that we have used Vervo for. The possibilities are endless with this mind-blowing Goal Tracker & habit tracker app. 


Features of Vervo - Goal Tracker & Habit Tracker App:

- Set to do list, track goals, and share your goals
- Set reminders to keep track of daily goals
- Use inspiration boards to help you stay motivated towards your goals
- Share goals with family and friends
- Go public for the world with this goal tracker and habit tracker app
- Add related readings to your daily goals
- Everything is free. No Ads. No Fees.

So what are you waiting for? Download Vervo - Goal Tracker & Habit Tracker App today to set on a journey of productivity, satisfaction and success!

title: Vervo - Goal tracker & habit tracker app

creator: LetsText, LLC
descriptionHtml:
Setting goals is easy but can you achieve them? Vervo is a smart goal & habit tracking app to help goalsetters accomplish more every day and achieve goals, whether they are work goals or life goals. Vervo helps you set goals and track them. One of our unique features is Vision Board where you can attach inspirational photos or videos to motivate you. Vervo also allows you to add tasks, reminders, notes, and track habits or routines that will help you achieve your goals and stop procrastinating.
It’s very important to have personal accountability and commitment to our goals. You don’t have to fail your new year resolution and new year goal. You just need a tool to help you from the goal setting process to track your progress. Vervo will help every goalsetter to become more productive, set and achieve goals, improve yourself, focusing more, and stop procrastinating.
=== FEATURES OF VERVO – SMART GOAL TRACKER & HABIT TRACKER: ===
🖊 Start your journey by setting a goal
🖊 Setting a goal for Private means it will be hidden from everyone.
🖊 Set Goals that you can share with Friends
🖊 Create Public Goals so everyone can see & join this goal.
🖊 Use Vision Board as an Inspiration to help you achieve goals.
🖊 Inspirations can be in the form of Photos or Videos.
🖊 Add routines or habits to help you achieve goals.
🖊 Add Tasks, Notes, and Reminders to Goals.
🖊 Track habits & routines easily.
🖊 Get points & badges as signs of your commitment.
🖊 Join our community to help you achieve your goals.
🖊 Vervo PRO: Add Daily Planner for better results.
You can use our app to help you lose weight, pay off your debt, save up some money, get better grades, or any career or work goals. Setting a goal with Vervo is very easy and we will guide you every step of the way. As a goalsetter, you can customize your goals in various ways. You can add routines that will help you achieve your goals such as: drink more water, eat vegetables, study for at least an hour a day or other positive habits. This habit tracking app helps you record how well you perform these routines. The points and badges will motivate you to continue your routines instead of procrastinating.

Support from friends and community is also extremely important to help you focus and achieve your goals. They can provide advice, inspiration, encouragement, and so much more. That’s why we allow you to share goals with your friends or Vervo community and connect you to people who also use Vervo. title: Vervo – Goal Tracker & Habit Tracker

creator: LetsText, LLC
descriptionHtml:
Setting goals is easy but can you achieve them? Vervo is a smart goal & habit tracking app to help goalsetters accomplish more every day and achieve goals, whether they are work goals or life goals. Vervo helps you set goals and track them. One of our unique features is Vision Board where you can attach inspirational photos or videos to motivate you. Vervo also allows you to add tasks, reminders, notes, and track habits or routines that will help you achieve your goals and stop procrastinating.
It’s very important to have personal accountability and commitment to our goals. You don’t have to fail your new year resolution and new year goal. You just need a tool to help you from the goal setting process to track your progress. Vervo will help every goalsetter to become more productive, set and achieve goals, improve yourself, focusing more, and stop procrastinating.
=== FEATURES OF VERVO – SMART GOAL TRACKER & HABIT TRACKER: ===
🖊 Start your journey by setting a goal
🖊 Setting a goal for Private means it will be hidden from everyone.
🖊 Set Goals that you can share with Friends
🖊 Create Public Goals so everyone can see & join this goal.
🖊 Use Vision Board as an Inspiration to help you achieve goals.
🖊 Inspirations can be in the form of Photos or Videos.
🖊 Add routines or habits to help you achieve goals.
🖊 Add Tasks, Notes, and Reminders to Goals.
🖊 Track habits & routines easily.
🖊 Get points & badges as signs of your commitment.
🖊 Join our community to help you achieve your goals.
🖊 Vervo PRO: Add Daily Planner for better results.
You can use our app to help you lose weight, pay off your debt, save up some money, get better grades, or any career or work goals. Setting a goal with Vervo is very easy and we will guide you every step of the way. As a goalsetter, you can customize your goals in various ways. You can add routines that will help you achieve your goals such as: drink more water, eat vegetables, study for at least an hour a day or other positive habits. This habit tracking app helps you record how well you perform these routines. The points and badges will motivate you to continue your routines instead of procrastinating.
Our mission is to help you accomplish more in your life. Everyone can achieve their new year goal and new year resolution if you’re committed to it. Support from friends and community is also extremely important to help you focus and achieve your goals. They can provide advice, inspiration, encouragement, and so much more. That’s why we allow you to share goals with your friends or Vervo community and connect you to people who also use Vervo. It’s also easier to have accountability when there are other people who know and share our goals. We are stronger when we support each other.

---
You may have friends and family who have difficulty achieving their life goals. Help them achieve their new year goal or their new resolution by inviting them to join Vervo, a smart goal & habit tracking app. You can support and inspire each other through your journey for more productive and accomplished lives.
descriptionShort: Vision Board, track habits, set goals to accomplish & achieve goals with Vervo.

- Updated regularly with productivity-boosting live challenges

- 3X faster routines loading
- Continuous improvements and user experience enhancements
- Fixes an issue with repetitive routine reminders

title: Vervo – Goal Tracker & Habit Tracker

creator: LetsText, LLC
descriptionHtml:
Set goals and accomplish more with Vervo! Vervo is an all-in-one productivity app with a focus on how you can set & achieve goals whether they are personal goals, work goals, or new years goals. We have many tools to build positive routines & achieve your goals: habit tracker, daily planners, task manager & todo list with priorities and deadlines for either chores or projects, vision board, and more.

Most of the productivity apps out there only have one purpose, whether they are task manager, todo list, daily planner, or goal tracker. On Vervo we want to combine these productivity apps and help you organize your life and be more productive and successful. You can also add notes, beautiful photos to help you visualize success, view your progress and accomplishment, and earn badges.

=== FEATURES OF VERVO – HABIT TRACKER & GOAL TRACKER: ===




📌 GOAL TRACKER
Set goal (either self-development goal, work goal, or new year goal). Your actionable goals determine whether you can achieve them or not so you should set a target that you can achieve and break down your goals. You may also use the Discover tab to see other users’ goals.

📌 HABIT TRACKER
Track your habits and routine. View your stats and see how close you are to achieving your goal. Are you On Track, Needs Work, or Running Behind?

📌 DAILY PLANNER
Open Vervo every morning as part of your morning routine. Add Daily Planner as a widget for your home screen to be reminded of your events or todo list for the day.

📌 TASK MANAGER & TODO LIST
Create your todo list with due date to prevent missing the deadline. You can add chores, bills to pay, homework, presentation, events, and anything that needs to be done. Priorities are also important so make sure you set the importance of each task.

📌 NOTES
Add your notes: important details about your goals, motivational quotes, shopping list or details about your chores, record your feelings throughout your journey, or anything you can think of.

📌 VISION BOARD
Make your life’s vision come true. Manifest & visualize your success through our vision board.

Successful life starts from the moment you open your eyes. We encourage you to open Vervo as part of your morning routines, check task manager, set priorities for the task and chores, and plan on how to finish your projects or paper before the deadline.

Once you’ve experienced how Vervo helps you to set goals and accomplish more in your life, you may want to upgrade to get better features that will really boost your productivity. Features for PRO version includes:

- No limit on goals & routines
- NO ADS
- Goal Plans
- Daily Planner
- Quantifiable Goals
- Customize the app themes
- Search tasks & diaries
- Rearrange goals & routines.
- PRO Badges
- Access pre-made Challenges

These pro features will help you achieve and accomplish more in your life, including work goals and new year goals. Don’t forget to do our Challenges. We have premade challenges and keep adding new ones. You will find challenges to be kind to others, to love yourself, to care for yourself, and many more!

Don’t wait any longer. Download Vervo – Habit & Goal Tracker today!
descriptionShort: Smart goal tracker with todo list, reminder, notes, habit tracker, vision board

title: Vervo – Habit & Goal Tracker

creator: Vervo LLC
descriptionHtml:
A daily planner to build a custom routine of good habits that help you reach your goal. It can be a personal goal, work goal, or new year's resolution. This is what this free goal tracker and habit tracker is all about.
Vervo is a smart habit tracker platform that improves your daily routines and organizes your personal and business plans. Using this habit changer and goal setter app, you can easily keep track of your progress, achieve impossible goals, change your lifestyle and become a better version of yourself.

√ Vervo recognized as the best goal tracker and habit changer platform
Vervo is a convenient and straightforward daily planner app that is designed to create a habit list and build good habits. You can track your tasks and routines productivity, and organize your life like never before.
This free goal setter and daily planner app delivers everything you should expect from such habit tracker apps, and it even sets the bar higher by allowing you to create shared goals and spread the positivity to your family and friends.
So, if you are looking for an advanced yet easy-to-use habit tracker app to organize your life, build a routine of positive habits, and plan your day efficiently, you’ve come to the right place.

► Set goals, build a custom routine, and accomplish more
Vervo, the free goal tracker and habit changer is all about helping you find a better version of yourself. This goal setter app comes with a clean and neat design and the interface is so user-friendly that you will get the whole idea as soon as trying to build up the very first routine.
◆ All-in-one productivity app: What makes this free habit tracker and goal planner app stand out in the competition is the way it combines multiple productivity applications in one single app. With this habit changer app, you can access a task manager, daily planner, to-do list scheduler, notes organizer, goal tracker, and habit tracker.

► What are you looking to accomplish? Let us help you find your better version!
Whether you are looking for a habit changer app to build your own custom habit, or you are looking for a goal tracker app to become more productive and achieve personal/work-related goals, we’ve got you covered.
To get started, you only need to specify what you wish to accomplish, provide more details about your preferred routine, and leave the rest to the smart goal tracker algorithm.

★ Vervo’s main features at a glance:
• Clean and neat design with a fresh and intuitive interface
• Daily habit builder to organize your life
• Reach your personal goals, work goals, or new years goals
• Set and achieve quantifiable goals
• Track your goals with ease
• Create notes and todo lists
• Task manager and daily planner
• Search tasks & diaries
• Rearrange goals & routines
• Cross-platform habit tracker and goal tracker

Stay tuned and let us know about any questions, feature requests, or any other suggestions.
descriptionShort: Goal tracker, habit changer & daily planner to build routines, create todo list.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Continuous improvements and performance enhancements.

title: Vervo – Goal & Habit Tracker

creator: Vervo LLC
descriptionHtml:
Set goals & achieve goals with Vervo, Goal Tracker & Project Tracker app! Vervo is a goal planning, goal tracking, project management, & task management app that every project manager dreams of. Improve teamwork, communication, & productivity using our project board. Don’t let your team members slack off, let Vervo support your management project & collaboration effort today!

After goal planning, now it’s time to take full control of your project and improve your teamwork as well as improve your productivity through effective projects coordination. Choosing the suitable & powerful project management and task management app is a crucial part of management project. Vervo have had long history of helping individuals to set goals & achieve goals in their lives. Now Vervo’s mission is to aid teams to achieve goals with the right tools for management project.

=== FEATURES OF VERVO – GOAL TRACKER & PROJECT TRACKER: ===



📊 Project Coordination & Collaboration
Vervo offers seamless projects management features. Coordinate & communicate tasks with your team members easily. As a project manager, you need to delegate tasks to your members and track their progress to make sure they don’t slack off.

📎 Detailed Task Management & Implementation
Vervo is a very comprehensive and detailed project management app that allows you to manage tasks & add details in one place. You can add and find details of each task easily. Add labels, attachments, files, add custom fields, and more.

📋 Custom Project Board Templates
Custom templates are very useful if you’ve never used projects management app before. If you don’t know where to begin, you can use our custom template to help set up your project board. Choose the template that is most suitable for your projects & team from our templates and kickstart your project today.

📆 Daily Agenda
Part of projects coordination effort is making sure everyone knows what they need to accomplish every day. We will display your daily agenda as soon as you log in. Open our app as you start your day to be more productive.

📈 Goal Tracking
Set goals & achieve goals with Vervo Goal Tracker feature. Start with goal planning and easily track your achievement with Vervo’s goal tracking feature.

☕ Habit Tracking
Vervo provides you with room to stay focused on your daily routines and habits while doing your pro work. As part of our suite of powerful tools, we recognize the significance of daily routines on our overall productivity and thus you’ll find our habit tracker as rich and detailed as you need it to be.


Vervo is very simple to use with many powerful features to improve your team’s productivity. Teamwork and collaboration are crucial if you want your project to succeed and make sure your team members don’t slack off. As a project manager, it’s important to choose the best tool for your management project effort.

Download Vervo now and see for yourself how Vervo is the right tool for you!

---

We welcome all feedback and ideas from our users. Please rate and review our app or send us an email to info@vervoapp.com to say hi. We hope that our features have helped improve your teamwork and productivity. If you enjoy using Vervo, we would ask your help to recommend our app to your friends and colleagues who are in need of projects coordination tool in their work.
descriptionShort: Set goals & achieve goals with Vervo project managements & task management app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This is the biggest update since the early days of Vervo, with this update we're introducing:
- All new project board: manage your projects, tasks, meetings, and more with a few taps.
- All new detailed task implementation including labels, attachments, files, custom fields, and more.
- Rebuilt home screen to show your entire daily agenda as you log in.
- Focused button to create all of your main items such as boards, tasks, events, and routines.

title: Project Tracker & Goal Manager

creator: Vervo LLC
descriptionHtml:
Improve your quality of life and succeed both professionally and privately with Vervo – the work & life organizer. Our personal and professional life, work, and team management tool allows you to set & track:

- goals (both personal and family/team)
- projects (both personal and group)
- to-do tasks (both personal and group/team)
- routines
- habits
- events
- daily agendas

Goal setting, routine planning, and project tracking have never been this neat and easy.

GOAL TRACKER: TRACK & ACCOMPLISH GOALS


📈 Our goal planner & goal manager tools allow you to add both personal and professional goals. Use our in-built goal creator to create a goal board. Then add milestones, tasks, notes, and more for each goal. Revert at any time for any of your personal or professional goals and follow goal progress to accomplish more.

📅PROJECT PLANNER: PLAN, MANAGE & TRACK PROJECTS IN DETAIL
Use Vervo as a project management tool to create, plan, and manage your projects with collaboration built at the core and tasks that have the finest details from dynamic statuses to multiple assignees, custom fields, project progress tracker & more.
Coordinate & communicate tasks with your team members easily within our project planning & team organization app. As a project manager, you need to delegate tasks to your members and track their progress to make sure they don’t slack off, and our project work management makes it easy to do that.

See why our project goal planner and tracker is one of the most complete, yet simplest project work manager apps.

✅Detailed Task Management & Implementation
Our team management and task tracker offers very comprehensive and detailed project management that allows you to manage tasks & add details in one place. Work smarter by adding and finding details of each task easily. Add labels, attachments, files, add custom fields, and more.

📋 Custom Project Board Templates Custom templates are very useful if you’ve never used a projects management app before. If you don’t know where to begin, you can use our custom template to help set up your project board. Pick the template within our project planning team organizer app that is most suitable for your projects & team from our templates and kickstart your project today.  📆 LIFE ORGANIZER - Daily Agenda Part of a project's coordination effort is making sure everyone knows what they need to accomplish every day. We will display your daily agenda as soon as you log in. Open our app as you start your day to be more productive. Now it comes with a Calendar Sync feature.  ☕ Habit Tracking Vervo goal organizer provides you with room to stay focused on your daily routines and habits while doing your pro work. Daily routines can improve overall productivity, so you’ll find our routine & habit tracker extremely handy.

💡SMART SCHEDULER
The new smart scheduler allows users to schedule events, routines, and tasks. It only shows you what matters in real-time. See updates about daily progress and know what’s left to be done today or look ahead for the month to plan.

GET VERVO NOW FOR FREE AND HAVE:
‣ detailed goal setter
‣ family & team collaboration app
‣ project management tool
‣ easy habit tracker & habit keeper for habit-forming
‣ routine planner & daily routine tracker
‣ task tracker, tasks management & organization app
‣ smart scheduler
‣ personal & teamwork management

Our life organizer and accomplishment tracker is very simple to use, yet comes with many features to organize and improve your private/professional life.

Vervo has one of the most affordable subscription rates in the goal and project management app niche.

If you have any queries about our project, goal, and habit tracker, contact us at info@vervoapp.com. Till then accomplish more, stay accountable, and work smarter with Vervo – the goal creator, day manager & project tracker app!

title: Project Tracker & Goal Manager

creator: Vervo LLC
descriptionHtml:
Improve your quality of life and succeed both professionally and privately with Vervo – your daily planner and life organizer. Our personal and professional life, work, and team management tool serves you as a:

- Daily planner
- To do list task manager
- Project management (personal & teams)
- Goals (both personal and family/team)
- To do tasks (both personal and group/team)
- Routines
- Habits
- Calendar events

Daily scheduling, goal setting, routine planning, and project tracking have never been this neat and easy.


💡Daily Planner
Vervo's AI-based daily planner allows you to easily set your daily schedule through the ability to schedule events, routines, and tasks. It only shows you what matters in real time. See updates about daily progress and know what’s left to be done today or look ahead for the month to plan.

📈 Goal Tracker:
Our goal planner & goal manager tools allow you to add both personal and professional goals. Use our in-built goal creator to create a goal board. Then add milestones, tasks, notes, and more for each goal. Revert at any time for any of your personal or professional goals and follow goal progress to accomplish more.

✅ Detailed Task Management & Implementation
Our team management and task tracker offers very comprehensive and detailed project management that allows you to do more, manage tasks, assign planners & add details in one place. Work smarter by adding and finding details of each task easily. Add labels, attachments, files, add custom fields, and more.

📅 Task Planner: Plan, Manage, and Track Projects in Detail.
Use Vervo as a project management tool to create, plan, and manage your projects with collaboration built at the core and tasks that have the finest details from dynamic statuses to multiple assignees, custom fields, project progress tracker & more.
Coordinate & communicate tasks with your team members easily within our project planning & team organization app. As a project manager, you need to delegate tasks to your members and track their progress to make sure they don’t slack off, and our project work management makes it easy to do that.

See why our project goal planner and tracker is one of the most complete, yet simplest project work manager apps.


📋 Custom Project Board Templates 
Custom templates are very useful if you’ve never used a project management app before. If you don’t know where to begin, you can use our custom template to help set up your project board. Pick the template within our project planning team organizer app that is most suitable for your projects & team from our templates and kickstart your project today.  

📆 Life Organizer & Daily Planner
 Part of a project's coordination effort is making sure everyone knows what they need to accomplish every day with an easy-to-use daily planner feature. We will display your daily agenda in our schedule planner as soon as you log in. Open our app as you start your day to be more productive. Now it comes with a Calendar Sync feature.  

☕ Habit Tracking 
Vervo's goal tracker feature provides you with room to stay focused as a planner on your daily routines and habits while doing your pro work. Daily routines can improve overall productivity, so you’ll find our routine & habit tracker extremely handy.



Get Vervo now and have:
‣ detailed daily planner & schedule planner
‣ family & team collaboration app
‣ project management tool
‣ easy habit tracker & habit keeper for habit-forming
‣ routine planner & daily routine tracker
‣ task tracker, tasks management & organization app
‣ smart scheduler
‣ personal & teamwork management

Our life organizer & daily planner is very simple to use, yet comes with many features to organize and improve your private/professional life.

Vervo has one of the most affordable subscription rates in the daily planner, goal, and project management app niche.

If you have any queries about our daily planner, project, goal, and habit tracker, contact us at info@vervoapp.com.

title: Vervo: To Do List Task Manager

creator: Vervo LLC
descriptionHtml:
VERVO: TASK, DAILY SCHEDULE, GOALS, ROUTINE, HABITS, AND PROJECT MANAGER


Are you living a super-busy lifestyle and feeling like your thoughts are all over the place?

Try Vervo, the AI powered Task Manager and Schedule Planner that is here to simplify planning, and help you organize and execute your tasks, projects, goals while helping you establish and track routines and habits.

Unlike other task managers, Vervo makes it simple to differentiate private from professional tasks which helps you stay organized both at home with your spouse and kids, and at work with your teammates/employees.

VERVO DAILY PLANNER - MULTIPLE WORK & LIFE ORGANIZER APPS INTO ONE


Whether you are a busy mom, dad, solopreneur, entrepreneur, project manager, or simply have too much going on, Vervo will help you accomplish more with less stress by offering:
- Synced daily planner - Synced to do list task manager powered by AI - Project management (personal & teams) - Goals (both personal and family/team) - To do tasks (both personal and group/team) - Routines - Habits - Calendar events

💡 AI Daily Planner
Vervo's AI-based daily planner allows you to easily set your daily schedule through the ability to schedule events, routines, and tasks. It only shows you what matters in real-time. See updates about daily progress and know what’s left to be done today or look ahead for the month to plan.

📅 Task Planner: Plan, Manage, and Track Projects in Detail.
Create, plan, and manage your projects with collaboration built at the core and tasks that have the finest details from dynamic statuses to multiple assignees, custom fields, project progress tracker & more.

Or, use it as a mom planner or family planner and add to do tasks and create to-do lists for your private life as well as organize your family.

✅ Detailed Project Task Management & Implementation
Our team management and task tracker offer very comprehensive and detailed project management that allows you to do more. Work smarter by adding/viewing each task easily in the task manager for android app. Add labels, attachments, files, add custom fields, and more.

Communicate tasks with your team members easily within our project planning & team organization app. Our work manager & team task assignment app allows project managers to delegate tasks and track progress.

See why our project management tool with project progress tracker is one of the most complete, yet simplest project work managers.

📋 Custom Project Board Templates 
Use them to help set up your project board. Pick the template within our project planning team organizer app that is most suitable for your projects & team and kickstart your project today.  

📆 Life Organizer & Daily Planner
Make sure you & everyone know what they need to accomplish every day with an easy-to-use daily planner feature. See your daily agenda in our schedule planner as soon as you log in (now with calendar sync).  

📈 Goal Tracker:
Our goal planner & goal manager tools allow you to add both personal and professional goals. Use our in-built goal creator to create a goal board. Then add milestones, tasks, notes, and more for each goal.

☕ Habit Tracking 
Vervo's goal tracker feature provides you with room to stay focused as a planner on your daily routines and habits.

GET OUR AI TASK MANAGER & SCHEDULE PLANNER APP AND HAVE

:
‣ to-do list daily planner & schedule planner
‣ family & team collaboration app
‣ create errands to do lists and share them with kids and partner/roommates
‣ project management tool
‣ easy habit tracker & habit keeper for habit-forming
‣ routine planner & daily routine tracker
‣ task tracker, tasks management & organization app
‣ smart scheduler
‣ breathing timer to take time off
‣ idea manager
‣ personal & teamwork management

Our life organizer with to-do lists & AI daily schedule planner is simple, yet comes with smart features to improve your private/professional life.

- Significantly increases the smoothness of your home screen for large schedules

title: Task-Manager & Daily Planner

creator: Vervo LLC
descriptionHtml:
MANAGE ANY TASK, GOAL, ROUTINE OR HABIT WITH VERVO


Are you living a super-busy lifestyle and feeling like your thoughts are all over the place?

Try Vervo, the AI powered Task Manager and Daily Planner that is here to simplify any task or project, and help you organize, plan and keep track of your goals, while helping you establish and track routines and habits.

Unlike other task manager apps, Vervo makes it simple to differentiate private from professional tasks which helps you stay organized both at home with your spouse and kids, and at work with your team/employees. You can set up custom reminders so you never miss anything.

VERVO DAILY PLANNER - ALL IN ONE TASK-MANAGER APP


Whether you are a busy mom, dad, entrepreneur, project manager, or simply have too much going on, Vervo will help with your daily planning and accomplish more with less stress by offering:
- Daily planner with AI - Synced to do list task manager powered by AI - Project management (personal & teams) - Goals (both personal and family/team) - To do tasks (both personal and group/team) - Routines - Habits - Calendar events/reminders

💡 AI Daily Planner
Vervo's AI-based daily planner allows you to easily set your daily schedule through the ability to schedule events, routines, and tasks. It only shows you what matters in real-time. See updates about daily progress and know what’s left to be done today or look ahead for the month to plan.

📅 Task-manager: Plan, Manage, and Track Projects in Detail.
Create, plan, and manage your projects with collaboration built at the core and tasks that have the finest details from dynamic statuses to multiple assignees, custom fields, project progress tracker & more.
Or, use it as a personal life / family planner and add to do tasks and create to-do lists for your private life as well as to organize your family.

✅ Detailed Project Management & Implementation
Our team management and task tracker offer very comprehensive and detailed project management that allows smart work management and task planning. Work smarter by adding/viewing each task easily in the task manager for android app. Add labels, attachments, files, reminders, custom fields, and more.

Assign tasks to your team members easily within our project planning & team manager app. Our work management & team task assignment app allows project managers to delegate tasks and track progress easily.

Why choose Vervo Project Management App?

📋 Custom Project Board Templates 
Use them to help set up your project board. Pick the template within our project planning team organizer app that is most suitable for your projects & team and kickstart your project today.  

📆 Life Organizer & Daily Planner
Make sure you & everyone know what they need to accomplish every day with an easy-to-use daily planner feature. See your daily agenda in our schedule planner as soon as you log in (now with calendar sync).  

📈 Goal Tracker:
Our goal planner & goal manager tools allow you to add both personal and professional goals. Use our in-built goal creator to create a goal board. Then add milestones, tasks, notes, and more for each goal.

☕ Habit Tracking 
Vervo's goal tracker feature provides you with room to stay focused on your daily routines and habits, with our focus timer.

GET OUR AI TASK MANAGER & SCHEDULE PLANNER APP AND HAVE:


‣ to-do list daily planner & schedule planner
‣ family & team collaboration app
‣ create errands to do lists and share them with kids and partner/roommates
‣ project management tool
‣ easy habit tracker & habit keeper for habit-forming
‣ routine planner & daily routine tracker
‣ task tracker, tasks management & organization app
‣ smart scheduler
‣ breathing timer to take time off
‣ idea manager
‣ personal & teamwork management

Our life organizer with to-do lists & AI daily planner is simple, yet comes with smart features to improve your private/professional life.

title:

12.7.7

creator: Vervo LLC
descriptionHtml:
MANAGE ANY TASK, GOAL, ROUTINE OR HABIT WITH VERVO


Are you living a super-busy lifestyle and feeling like your thoughts are all over the place?

Try Vervo, the AI powered Task Manager and Daily Planner that is here to simplify any task or project, and help you organize, plan and keep track of your goals, while helping you establish and track routines and habits.

Unlike other task manager apps, Vervo makes it simple to differentiate private from professional tasks which helps you stay organized both at home with your spouse and kids, and at work with your team/employees. You can set up custom reminders so you never miss anything.

VERVO DAILY PLANNER - ALL IN ONE TASK-MANAGER APP


Whether you are a busy mom, dad, entrepreneur, project manager, or simply have too much going on, Vervo will help with your daily planning and accomplish more with less stress by offering:
- Daily planner with AI - Synced to do list task manager powered by AI - Project management (personal & teams) - Goals (both personal and family/team) - To do tasks (both personal and group/team) - Routines - Habits - Calendar events/reminders

💡 AI Daily Planner
Vervo's AI-based daily planner allows you to easily set your daily schedule through the ability to schedule events, routines, and tasks. It only shows you what matters in real-time. See updates about daily progress and know what’s left to be done today or look ahead for the month to plan.

📅 Task-manager: Plan, Manage, and Track Projects in Detail.
Create, plan, and manage your projects with collaboration built at the core and tasks that have the finest details from dynamic statuses to multiple assignees, custom fields, project progress tracker & more.
Or, use it as a personal life / family planner and add to do tasks and create to-do lists for your private life as well as to organize your family.

✅ Detailed Project Management & Implementation
Our team management and task tracker offer very comprehensive and detailed project management that allows smart work management and task planning. Work smarter by adding/viewing each task easily in the task manager for android app. Add labels, attachments, files, reminders, custom fields, and more.

Assign tasks to your team members easily within our project planning & team manager app. Our work management & team task assignment app allows project managers to delegate tasks and track progress easily.

Why choose Vervo Project Management App?

📋 Custom Project Board Templates 
Use them to help set up your project board. Pick the template within our project planning team organizer app that is most suitable for your projects & team and kickstart your project today.  

📆 Life Organizer & Daily Planner
Make sure you & everyone know what they need to accomplish every day with an easy-to-use daily planner feature. See your daily agenda in our schedule planner as soon as you log in (now with calendar sync).  

📈 Goal Tracker:
Our goal planner & goal manager tools allow you to add both personal and professional goals. Use our in-built goal creator to create a goal board. Then add milestones, tasks, notes, and more for each goal.

☕ Habit Tracking 
Vervo's goal tracker feature provides you with room to stay focused on your daily routines and habits, with our focus timer.

GET OUR AI TASK MANAGER & SCHEDULE PLANNER APP AND HAVE

:
‣ to-do list daily planner & schedule planner
‣ family & team collaboration app
‣ create errands to do lists and share them with kids and partner/roommates
‣ project management tool
‣ easy habit tracker & habit keeper for habit-forming
‣ routine planner & daily routine tracker
‣ task tracker, tasks management & organization app
‣ smart scheduler
‣ breathing timer to take time off
‣ idea manager
‣ personal & teamwork management

Our life organizer with to-do lists & AI daily planner is simple, yet comes with smart features to improve your private/professional life.

creator: TaskyCal LLC - Life Organizer & Habit Tracker
descriptionHtml:
📅 Simple Life Organizer and Habit Tracker Planner: Say goodbye to cluttered calendars/appointments and hello to effortless organization and schedule planning. The intuitive interface makes it easy to manage your calendars and plan your daily and weekly calendars and habits with precision.

📝 Task Management & Planning: Keep track of your tasks and to-dos with ease with this life organizer. From deadlines to priorities, TaskyCal helps you stay on top of your responsibilities with customizable task lists and reminders.

🔄 Habit Tracker: Cultivate positive habits and break free from old routines. With this simple schedule maker comes a built-in habit tracker makes it simple to monitor your progress and stay accountable every step of the way.

🔔 Organizer Smart Reminders: Never miss a beat with TaskyCal's intelligent reminder system. Whether it's an important meeting, daily habit, or calendars appointment, you'll receive timely notifications to keep you on track.

🌐 Sync Across Devices: Access your schedule anytime, anywhere with organized, seamless synchronization across all your devices in a single schedule maker. Whether you're on your phone, tablet, or desktop, this life organizer keeps you connected and organized on the go.

🗃️Appointment Scheduler: All of your important appointments and meetings can be scheduled ahead of time and TaskyCal’s appointment schedule maker will find the perfect free time to schedule them and remind you ahead of time.

Introducing TaskyCal, your ultimate daily, monthly, and weekly life organizer, habit tracker, and calendar designed to revolutionize the way you manage your daily tasks, events, habits, and calendars. Tired of juggling multiple apps to keep track of your schedule? Say goodbye to the chaos and hello to a seamless organization with TaskyCal - your all-in-one calendar planner, habit tracker, and visual calendar.


No more scattered reminders and disjointed schedules or paper-based habit trackers and habit planners. Our intuitive interface brings all your tasks and events together in one streamlined, sync platform, eliminating the friction of switching between different apps. Whether you're a busy professional, a dedicated student, or a multitasking parent, this simple planner empowers you to take control of your day with ease.
Gather up your calendars, habit trackers, and planning efforts into a single simple calendar serving as your daily schedule planner and monthly organizer. Whether you got appointments, busy monthly days, or in need for a powerful planing that puts your calendars and habits together, we’ve got you covered.

Imagine the time when you needed to check your running habits but also make sure it didn’t interfere with your appointments or planning efforts. Well, this is where this visual calendar app comes into play by helping you stay organized with all of your habits, calendars, habit trackers, and goals into a visual calendar that saves your time and effort while getting things organized and done.

Harness the power of robust features to optimize your productivity and streamline your schedule maker endeavors. Effortlessly create and manage tasks, set reminders, and track your progress with just a few taps. Our smart AI algorithms prioritize your habits and tasks, ensuring that you stay focused on what matters most.

This app is more than just a productivity tool - it's a personal calendar and appointment scheduler that adapts to your unique needs and preferences. Customize your schedule, color-code your events, and sync across all your devices for seamless accessibility. Whether you're planning a hectic workday or organizing a relaxing weekend getaway, TaskyCal has you covered.


Experience the difference with TaskyCal - the ultimate life organizer, habit tracker, appointment scheduler, organizer, and habit tracker for busy individuals like you. Download now and take the first step towards a more organized, efficient, and fulfilling life.

Introducing TaskyCal, your ultimate daily, monthly, and weekly time blocking assitant, habit tracker, and calendar designed to revolutionize the way you manage your daily tasks, events, habits, and calendars. Tired of juggling multiple apps to keep track of your schedule? Say goodbye to the chaos and hello to a seamless organization with TaskyCal - your all-in-one calendar planner, time blocking, and routine planner.


No more scattered reminders and disjointed to-do lists or paper-based habit trackers and routine planners. Our intuitive interface brings all your tasks and events together in one streamlined, sync platform, eliminating the friction of switching between different apps. Whether you're a busy professional, a dedicated student, or a multitasking parent, this simple planner empowers you to take control of your day with ease.
Gather up your calendars, habit trackers, and planning efforts into a single simple calendar serving as your daily schedule planner and monthly organizer. Whether you got appointments, busy monthly days, or in need for a powerful task manager that puts your calendars and habits together, we’ve got you covered.

Imagine the time when you needed to check your running to-do list but also make sure it didn’t interfere with your appointments or planning efforts. Well, this is where this visual calendar app comes into play by helping you stay organized with all of your habits, calendars, habit trackers, and goals into a visual calendar that saves your time and effort while getting things organized and done.

Harness the power of robust features to optimize your productivity and streamline your to-do list & task manager endeavors. Effortlessly create and manage tasks, set reminders, and track your progress with just a few taps. Our smart AI algorithms prioritize your habits and tasks, ensuring that you stay focused on what matters most.

This app is more than just a productivity tool - it's a personal calendar, to-do list and appointment scheduler that adapts to your unique needs and preferences. Customize your schedule, color-code your task manager, & sync across your devices for seamless accessibility. Whether you're planning a hectic workday or organizing a relaxing weekend getaway, TaskyCal has you covered.


Experience the difference with TaskyCal - the ultimate life organizer, habit tracker, appointment scheduler, organizer, and habit tracker for busy individuals like you. Download now and take the first step towards a more organized, efficient, and fulfilling life.
